name: 'Ways and Means' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did viewers find out is Sam's middle name?
questions.explanation:
Norman.

	Mr. Rollins read off the list of people involved in the MS scandal who would receive subpoenas. Zacharias was Toby's middle name and Thomas was Leo's middle name.

questions.text: Did Donna grow up on a farm or in a condo?
questions.explanation:
condo.

	Josh reminds her that she grew up in a condo in Wisconsin.

questions.text: What did Josh tell Sam he didn't want getting around?
questions.correct: He wanted to be a ballerina at the age of four
questions.explanation:
He wanted to be a ballerina at the age of four.

	After Josh asked Sam to keep that fact to himself, Sam said "Yeah, fat chance of that."

questions.text: Along with Josh, who did Leo say has a tendency to tick people off?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Leo was making this comment because both Josh and Toby were getting ready to attend a meeting about the estate tax.

questions.text: Who said, "Am I crazy or is this not a job for the U.S. House of Representatives?"
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	CJ pulled Leo into the hall and said, "Leo, we need to be investigated by someone who wants to kill us just to watch us die. We need someone perceived by the American people to be irresponsible, untrustworthy, partisan, ambitious and thirsty for the limelight. Am I crazy or is this not a job for the U.S. House of Representatives?"

questions.text: Josh set Donna up with Cliff Calley from House Ways and Means.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ainsley set Donna up with Cliff. She and Cliff went to law school together and she knew that Cliff broke up with his girlfriend so she set up a date between Donna and Cliff.

questions.text: Who did Ainsley say needed a haircut?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Ainsley ran into Sam in CJ's office and mentioned that he needed a haircut.

questions.text: Had the President replaced Mrs. Landingham yet?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Charlie wanted him to start looking, but he wouldn't.

questions.text: What name did Bruno give to Margaret?
questions.explanation:
Gertrude.

	Bruno still doesn't know Margaret's name and called her Gertrude when he entered the office. Only when Leo called for her did Bruno say to himself, "Margaret. Margaret!"

questions.text: What was the last line of the episode spoken by a senior staff member?
options: "That's a full lid, everybody, have a good night."
"You don't have a bottle opener, do you?"
questions.explanation:
"Come and get us."

	CJ popped the top on her beer and said this line as they watched Thomas on TV.
